node.name: Dionysus
node.description: AI-powered SaaS platform for real-time GitHub repo interaction with project onboarding, commit visualization, and an AI chat assistant using RAG and custom embeddings.

node.name: StreamMate
node.description: A full-stack Real-Time Chat Application designed to enable seamless communication with an interactive and personalized user experience. This web app supports real-time messaging, secure user authentication, and live user tracking, making it ideal for both personal and group chats.

node.name: AutoApply
node.description: Built a cross-platform auto-fill solution for universities to automate data entry across dynamic web forms. The system includes a web app and Chrome extension that detects form structures and injects user data on demand. Features secure data management with a relational database, RESTful APIs, and seamless user experience.

node.name: Events
node.description: A full-stack event management platform that allows users to create, manage, and view events with real-time updates, secure authentication, and a responsive design. Deployed on free-tier services for seamless accessibility. üöÄ

node.name: AI_Recipe_Generator
node.description: The AI-Based Recipe Generator is a web application designed to help users discover, create, and share recipes. Leveraging AI, it generates personalized recipe suggestions, assists users in crafting new recipes, and provides a platform for sharing culinary creations.

node.name: Food_Ordering_Web_App
node.description: Designed and developed a responsive web app for a food delivery platform, focusing on intuitive user experience and seamless navigation. Implemented features for searching, filtering, and recommending restaurants to enhance user experience.  Displayed restaurant-specific menus with real-time data using the Rapid API.
